articles.author: Richard Connor
articles.title: German chancellor: Some of US security plan 'unacceptable' - DW
articles.description: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz has criticized elements of the Trump administration's new national security strategy. He says it has been portraying Europe in a way Berlin finds politically misplaced.
articles.content:
German Chancellor Friedrich Merz said Tuesday the new US National Security Strategy unveiled last week contained parts that were  "unacceptable to us from a European perspective."
Merz also said Eur… [+3140 chars]
